titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Ina Christensen photograph collection.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Member of St. Peter's Danish Evangelical Lutheran Church, Detroit, Mich.
archdesc.scopecontent: Group portraits of Sunday School on the church steps (ca. 1916) with Pastor Holm and his wife at center of the top row; Danish Young People's Society outing (1922); and meeting of the Dansk sammensluttet ungdom (Danish American Young People's League) (1926).

corpname.primary_name: St. Peter's Danish Evangelical Lutheran Church (Detroit, Mich.)
